attributes.action: Close Marie stopes Northern Ireland and accept the unborns right to life.
attributes.background:
Because as a former
Fetis it is inhumune and Immoral for the murder of children to be accepted because of disability conception gender and any other sick reason like the child wasn't planned children are dying because of this  and it is disgusting it is a horrendous crime against humankind.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. The UK Parliament is unable to legislate on matters which are devolved to Northern Ireland.

If you live in Northern Ireland and would like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
